file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 24-34-01-02 - APU STARTER/GENERATOR - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL APU STARTER/GENERATOR - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section refers you to the publication necessary to put the APU starter/generator back to a serviceable condition and to replace the APU starter/generator brushes. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 24-34-01-900-801-A ♦ APU STARTER/GENERATOR - RESTORE APU STARTER/GENERATOR - BRUSHES ALL 24-34-01-960-802-A ♦ DISCARD EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 24-34-01 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 24-34-01-900-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. APU STARTER/GENERATOR - RESTORE A. General (1) This procedure refers you to the publication which will help you to put the APU starter/ generator back to a serviceable condition. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 24-34-01-000-801-A/400 APU STARTER/GENERATOR - REMOVAL AMM TASK 24-34-01-400-801-A/400 APU STARTER GENERATOR - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 49-11-00-000-801-A/400 APU COWLING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 49-11-00-400-801-A/400 APU COWLING - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 Tail cone D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Tail cone I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) Remove the APU cowling ( AMM TASK 49-11-00-000-801-A/400). J. Restore APU Starter/Generator (Figure 201) SUBTASK 900-002-A (1) Replace the APU starter/generator with other in conditions for flight ( AMM TASK 24-34-01-000-801-A/400) and ( AMM TASK 24-34-01-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 24-34-01 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Refer to the latest revision of the Component Maintenance Manual with Illustrated Parts List for DC Starter-Generator, 23080 Series III, by Lucas Aerospace, to put the APU starter/generator back to a serviceable condition. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) Install the APU cowling ( AMM TASK 49-11-00-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 24-34-01 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL APU Starter/Generator Figure 201 A ZONE 313 DET. A B APU STARTER/GENERATOR DET. B 145AMM240022.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 24-34-01 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 24-34-01-960-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. APU STARTER/GENERATOR - BRUSHES DISCARD A. General (1) This procedure refers you to the publication which will help you to replace the APU starter/ generator Brushes. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 24-34-01-000-801-A/400 APU STARTER/GENERATOR - REMOVAL AMM TASK 24-34-01-400-801-A/400 APU STARTER GENERATOR - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 49-11-00-000-801-A/400 APU COWLING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 49-11-00-400-801-A/400 APU COWLING - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 Tail cone D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Tail cone I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the APU cowling ( AMM TASK 49-11-00-000-801-A/400). J. Discard APU Starter/Generator Brushes (Figure 201) SUBTASK 960-002-A (1) Replace the APU starter/generator with other in conditions for flight ( AMM TASK 24-34-01-000-801-A/400) and ( AMM TASK 24-34-01-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-802-A/200 24-34-01 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Refer to the latest revision of the Component Maintenance Manual with Illustrated Parts List for DC Starter-Generator, 23080 Series III, by Lucas Aerospace, to replace the APU starter/generator brushes. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the APU cowling ( AMM TASK 49-11-00-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-802-A/200 24-34-01 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A.
